question: What is the main characteristic of a Two-Tier Client-Server Architecture?

answers.a: Client and Server are separate but communicate through an intermediary.
answers.b: Client and Server communicate directly without an intermediary.
answers.c: Multiple servers interact with a single client.
answers.d: Data is processed on the client side only.
